text:
This is a 71 y.o male with 6 week hx. Of diarrhea (non bloody) and
   weakness. Pt. underwent screening colonoscopy on [**11-1**] which revealed
   an obstructing/bleeding hepatic flexure mass. Bx done at that time.
   PMhx.
   CHF, HTN, Hyperlipedemia, COPD, DM II, ischemic heart dz., s/p CABG x2
   in [**2158**].
   Today Pt. went to OR for scheduled lap colectomy that turned into open
   colectomy. Pt. failed extubation in OR and reintubated there. Also Pt.
   had been hypotensive to 60
s systolic and non responsive to neo
   boluses. Started on Neo gtt. CXR consistent with CHF and pt. recived 40
   mg IV lasix in PACU.  EBL minimal per PACU report.
   .H/O heart failure (CHF), Diastolic, Acute on Chronic
   Assessment:
   Pt. failed extubation in OR. CXR showed CHF. Recived Lasix 40 mg in
   PACU. Hypotensive and on Neo upon transfer from PACU. Propofol weaned
   down from 25mcg to 15mcg for sedation.
   Action:
   Repeat cxr in MICU. Neo weaned off and BP stable at 100
s systolic.
   Response:
   Maintaining BP at 110
s/50
s with MAP>70. HR 70
s NSR with no ectopy
   noted. Second set of cardiac enzymes sent at 1800 and pending.
   Plan:
   Respiratory failure, acute (not ARDS/[**Doctor Last Name 2**])
   Assessment:
   Hx. Of COPD. Failed extubation post surgery.  Recived from PACU
   intubated on A/C 460x 14 PEEP5 and 60% FiO2. LS clear and diminished at
   bases.  ABG 7.30/54/193 at 1700.
   Action:
   Vent changed to CPAP 5/5 with 40%.
   Response:
   Repeat ABG at 1800
   Plan:
   [**Last Name 19**] Problem
 s/p open colectomy
   Assessment:
   Pt. s/p open colectomy today for obstructive mass.  Low abd. Midline
   incision covered with DSD and tegaderm. Srtyker pump infusing
   Bupivicane to wound.
   Action:
   Monitor incision site for s/s of bleeding.
   Response:
   Dsg. Remains CDI. BS hypoactive. Pt. NPO.  Pt. shakes head no when
   asked if in pain.
   Plan:
   Cont. to monitor. Maintain pump for 72hr as ordered. Surgery will
   remove pump.

info.concept: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease of horses
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease of horses
